Field Description: the MorphoSource media number pertaining to the dataset used to create a media file
the DOI of the media file pertaining to the dataset used to create a media file (this need not be a morphosource derived DOI)
any software used to create the final media file from 'raw scan data' whatever that may be
type of technology used to create scan (e.g., laser scan, structured light, photogrammetry, CT, microCT MRI, RTI, etc.)
distinct from technicians and/or copyright holder - more or less takes the place of project ID
flat panel vs. linear array vs. image intensifier *obsolete for modern systems, but relevant for legacy data
distance between x-ray source and target object
distance between x-ray source and target object
e.g., Hounsfield units or not - relevant only for medical and some pre-clinical systems
e.g., data converted to bone density values rather than raw CT numbers
e.g., iodine staining for CT scan, or white-coating for laser scanning, etc.
